short_summary: Complete consumer credit reports to the Government of Canada
description: The service provider must provide complete consumer credit reports through members of the Associated Credit Bureau of Canada
full_summary:
=================
**[EP243-231758] Access to Credit Check Services**
### Tender Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting a Request for Proposal (RFP) from a service provider to supply complete consumer credit reports to the Government of Canada.

### Opportunity Details

* **Solicitation Number:** WS3973390153
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)
* **Procurement Category:** Goods (Approvisionnement des biens)
* **UNSPSC Codes:** 55000000 (Published Products), 55110000 (Electronic reference material)
* **Industry Category:** Electronic Document and Information Resources Services (Services de ressources documentaires et d'information électroniques)

### Service Requirements

The service provider must provide complete consumer credit reports to the Government of Canada through members of the Associated Credit Bureau of Canada. The reports must be supplied in a fast, accurate, and reliable manner.

### Contract Details

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **End User Entities:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Name: Picco2, Robert (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: robert.picco2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
	+ Phone: Not available
	+ Fax: Not available

### Proposal Submission

To submit a proposal, access the tender notice on the Ariba discovery website ([https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18628841?extsite=MTg2Mjg4NDFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18628841?extsite=MTg2Mjg4NDFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)) and follow the instructions. Please note that this tender has expired, but we have still provided the above information for reference purposes only.  ### Distribution CFAIYÑ G Bouncer
